text: Futhi kwathi lapho sebevula imithwalo yabo bathola ukuthi imali yabo iphindiselwe emumva kubona bathi, “Oh Baba wethu! yini enye esingayifisa na? Lena imali yethu ibuyiselwe kuthina futhi kufanele sithole ukudla komndeni wethu futhi silondoloze umfowethu futhi sandise isilinganiso somthwalo wekameli, lokho kuyisilinganiso esilula”
